name: Father's Cabin
description:
Press any button to begin.

Controls

A - Left

D - Right

SPACE  -  Activate

Artist & Programmer: Steve Mattsen

Composer: Aerosol_man

Made for the great Nokia 3310 Game Jam of 2021! There are some rough edges I didn't have time to smooth out. I also would have liked to add a bunch more to this game, hence the large empty area to the right.
